message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?

I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob. I can do $13500, but I'm not willing to go any lower than that. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really get a lot of value out of the product.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $12000?
